pr_title: [BEAM-9430, BEAM-2939] Migrate from ProcessContext#updateWatermark to WatermarkEstimators

timeline.bodyText: This is a backwards-incompatible change. It probably does not affect many users but we should make sure to announce it, e.g. via the release notes.
timeline.author: mxm
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -265,18 +265,6 @@ * data has been explicitly requested. See {@link Window} for more information. */ public abstract PaneInfo pane(); - - /** - * Gives the runner a (best-effort) lower bound about the timestamps of future output associated - * with the current element. - * - *

If the {@link DoFn} has multiple outputs, the watermark applies to all of them. - * - *

Only splittable {@link DoFn DoFns} are allowed to call this method. It is safe to call - * this method from a different thread than the one running {@link ProcessElement}, but all - * calls must finish before {@link ProcessElement} returns. - */ - public abstract void updateWatermark(Instant watermark);

replies.bodyText: Sounds good. Will open a PR to edit the release notes as follow-up.
replies.author: lukecwik
